title: New: Dum Dum Girls – Coming Down
body: _[Only in Dreams](http://pitchfork.com/news/43050-dum-dum-girls-announce-new-album-tour/)_, the sophomore full-length from [Dum Dum Girls](http://pitchfork.com/artists/27600-dum-dum-girls/), will be released on September 27, via [Sub Pop](http://www.subpop.com/). The first recording from the LP dropped yesterday, listen through the widget below, or enter your email to download.
